resources.string: This is a lightweight tool to transfer files between your Android phone and your macOS devices.

string-array.name: welcome_to_androp_tutorial
string-array.item: Install and launch AnDrop for mac on your macOS device from the App Store.
Make sure your Android device is in the same Wifi as your mac.
Press on the Android share button of a photo, pdf or any other file you\'d like to share.
Click on the AnDrop app in the Android sharing sheet.
Congratulations! Your file is now in the Download folder of your macOS device.
